attributes.action: Do not ban petrol and diesel cars by 2040
attributes.additional_details: I have always run petrol fuel powered and manual driven cars myself. I do not want the hassle of recharging an electric or hybrid car once every few hundred miles There is also nowhere near enough charging points in the UK for electric and hybrid cars and still will not be even by 2040 as well.  Petrol and Diesel cars are far more practical and easier, cheaper and more convienient to mantain as well.
attributes.background: Do not ban petrol and diesel fuel powered cars by 2040. Electric and Hybrid cars are simply not practical and there is nowhere near enough charging points in the UK for electric and hybrid cars as well.
